content: ch1 close with an invisible join fo 50hdc 5picot3 10sc 10sl st 10 ch1 5fpdc you have now done your first flower fasten_off and start on a second one but work only up until round 4 continue on with the alternative round 5 below alternative round 5 attachpoints 2 1 to 1 3 see pic petal 1 single_crochet in the second double_crochet 2hdc 2hdc in the chain-1 space half_double_crochet chain 2 drop the loop and put it through the 2nd chain st in any of first flowers picots grab the loop again pull through and chain make a slip_stitch in the first chain of flower 2 to complete the picot half_double_crochet 2hdc 2hdc single_crochet sl st and in-between each petal you will do the following ch1 fpdc around the 3rd double_crochet of the popcorn from round 1 ch1 skip 2 1 chain 2 2 drop the loop and insert through the second chain stitch in the opposite flower 3 pull through the loop and chain 4 slip_stitch in the first chain stitch and then finish the first petal petal 2 -5 slip_stitch single_crochet 2hdc 2hdc half_double_crochet picot3 half_double_crochet in the ch1-space 2hdc 2hdc single_crochet slip_stitch and in-between each petal you will do the following ch1 fpdc around the 3rd double_crochet of the popcorn from round 1 ch1 skip 2 fo flower 3 attach points 3 1 to 1 1 3 2 to 2 5 petal 1 attach point 3 1 to 1 1 single_crochet in the second double_crochet 2hdc 2hdc in the chain-1 space half_double_crochet chain 2 drop the loop and put it through the 2nd chain st in the petal picot to the right side of the first join of first flower grab the loop again pull through and slip_stitch make a second slip_stitch in the first chain of flower 2 half_double_crochet 2hdc 2hdc single_crochet slip_stitch and in- between each petal you will do the following ch1 fpdc around the 3rd double_crochet of the popcorn from round 1 ch1 skip 2 petal 2 attach point 3 2 to 2 5 slip_stitch single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2hdc in the chain-1 space half_double_crochet chain 2 drop the loop and put it through the 2nd chain st in the petal picot to the right side of the first join of first flower grab the loop again pull through and slip_stitch make a second slip_stitch in the first chain of flower 2 half_double_crochet 2hdc 2hdc single_crochet slip_stitch and in-between each petal you will do the following ch1 fpdc around the 3rd double_crochet of the popcorn from round 1 ch1 skip 2 close with an invisible join in the first slip_stitch of the round 50hdc 5picot3 10sc 11 slip_stitch 10 ch1 5fpdc and you are done push a knitting needle through the back of the two top picots on the second and third flower tie a rope around it and put on your wall
